Some refactoring: Move all Activities into activity subpackage, move DB into dao subpackage, refactored TramHunterRequest to be TramHunterServiceSOAP and extracted TramHunterService interface. Changed StopDetailsActivity to only create DB instance once in onCreate() and close it once in onDestroy() - other Activity implementations still need to be updated. Added generics where missing.
Refactoring: Removed redundant TramTrackerRequest since it's now TramTrackerServiceSOAP.

Added pop up alerting the user they have no set up favourite stops and tried to explain how they can add them (as it is a little confusing to the user on how to use favourites).

When you select the option to go to favourite on startup it will automatically jump to the closest favourite stop.

James and Matt:
New Screen which predicts trips on favourites.
You need min 2 favs on 1 route (so it can identify a 'trip')
You need to be within 1 km of one of these fav stops.
